title: SUPRUS Electric Arc Lighter Windproof Flameless USB Rechargeable Lighter with LED Light for Candle Camping BBQ Cooking (Champagne Gold)
features: SAFETY PROTECTION DESIGN - This long stem lighter can protect you from the flames at a safe distance. And the safety lock make sure that you can only generate the sparks after unlocking, it's all about your children's safety. Advanced chipset prevents overheat and overcharge. This USB rechargeable lighter for candles will also automatically stop after 7 seconds of ignition.

WIND & SPLASH PROOF - The lighter adopt plasma arc windproof flameless technology, compared with traditional matches lighters, instead of using butane, no flame, eco-friendly & reusable. The design makes this lighter ideal for candle, gas stove, BBQ, grills, outdoor camping and many other uses.

PORTABLE & CONVENIENT - The size of this flameless lighter is very small and slim. It is suitable for daily indoor and and outdoor use. Especially perfect for travel camping, hiking, BBQs, candles, cooking, fireplaces, fireworks and so on.
BATTERY NOTIFICATION - This is the upgraded SUPRUS arc lighter which can display real time battery volume. When 4 LED lights on the barrel turn on, it is full charged.
WHAT YOU GET - SUPRUS rechargeable lighter, USB charging cable, a gift box, a user manual and 24h friendly services.
description: Product Description SUITABLE FOR DIFFERENT OCCASIONS Arc lighter also can be used as Flameless Candle Lighter, Plasma Bean Lighter, Camping Lighter, BBQ Lighter, Kitchen Lighter, Torch Lighter, Fire Starter, Fireplace Pilot Lighter. Outdoor Utility Lighter Suit for birthday candle, BBQ grills, camping, and many other uses. Package Include： 1 * USB Rechargeable Windproof Arc Lighter 1 * Micro USB cable 1 * Gift Box Children Safety Button Need to slide out the tip and press the activation button. Slide-Out Tip is design for preventing mistakenly touching. Wind & Splash Proof The wind and splash-proof design will protect the electric pulse from being blown out by strong wind or wet weather. The contacts is wider than other lighters. SUPRUS lighter is a fantastic tool for lighting under bad weather. Battery Notification This is the upgraded SUPRUS arc lighter which can display real time battery volume. When 4 LED lights on the barrel turn on, it is full charged. Hanging Hook Easy hang, it can be hung on kitchen walls, windows, doors and etc, convenience. Frequently question respond Is this easy to light? My mom doesn't have the strength to use a traditional candle lighter. Yes, it is easy to light. All you have to do is press the little power button that is on it and then hold it to the wick. The candle will be light in seconds. Is the rechargeable lighter safe to use to light gas stove? Yes, it can be used for light gas stove. And for the safety of consumer, the igniting spark will auto stop beyond 10 seconds per igniting. Does this electric arc lighter come with USB charging cable and what type of charging cable? Yes, it comes with a charging cable. You can use the USB port to charge it through computer. If it is missing, you can use a mobile phone charging cable. They are the same kind of charging cable. How to clean the tip parts of the lighter? The tips are made of heat resistance ceramics ( the ceramics do not burn）. But carbon from candle soot and charring wax produced by candle burn when lighter literally jamming it into the wick . You can clean the tip parts of lighter with soft cloth . Let SUPRUS bright your life!
